com.meteorcode.pathway.samples.sparks

Class BounceProperty

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.meteorcode.pathway.model.Property
      • com.meteorcode.pathway.samples.sparks.BounceProperty

  • public class BounceProperty
extends Property
    BounceProperty is a Property which validates MoveEvents on the event stack. BounceProperty will filter MoveEvents on Balls which are out of bounds, instead sending them back and changing their velocity in order to bounce them.

    • Constructor Summary

      • onEvent

        public boolean onEvent(Event e,
              Context c)
        Description copied from class: Property
        This method is triggered when the property is evented. This should be filled with the correct behaviour by scripts that create Properties.
        Specified by:
        onEvent in class Property
        Parameters:
        e - the Event eventing this Property.
        c - the Context on which the triggering event was pumped
